attributes.title: SCARY APP🔪😈👹
attributes.review:
you may think this is just a simple political
app but it is not!!! this app has images of horrifying orange creatures which keep me up at night. this app also has been cursed by the fashion gods for promoting the ugliest clothes to ever see the light of day. it also makes you enter your information so you can never escape the horror, AND to finish it off the online “rally’s” are cult meeting and when you join it a demon will appear in your house!!! do not download this app unless you are willing to spend a lifetime full of fear!

attributes.title: Wish I could give it a .5 star review
attributes.review: This app is slow,glitches, and now my Apple Music account doesn’t work either!!! I am a big trump fan and when I heard I could get this app I was SO EXCITED however I’m wavering in my allegiance as this new fangled technology has greatly FAILED me just as the radical left fails America... DO NOT GET THE APP you will be disheartened when it causes your phone an inability to play any of your Nickel Back or Kenny Chesney albums as it did to mine... Trump has failed me and disappointed me for the first time ever 😔.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!!!🤢🤮🤬💩💩🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡
attributes.review: When I opened the app my vision suddenly turned orange. Then I was transported to some celestial plane where I was met by a bunch of straight, cis, white men in red hooded maga cloaks. They shoved me into the back of a cop car (acab) and drove me to a secret bunker. In the bunker why diaper don himself, crying on Twitter over how antifa is a terrorist organization that created tiktok to conspire against him by masking as the Chinese government. I then had to fight bunker boy to the death and thankfully won. Don’t download this app unless you are prepared to fight against an army of armed brainwashed maga zombies and their puppet master.

attributes.title: This is absolutely insane
attributes.review: So I though that this app would be amazing to keep up with the worst president in existence turns out since I was black I was discouraged to make an account. What does the color of my skin have to do with anything😭😭. This was heartbreaking that I couldn’t be updated on the idiocy of this stupid president. Don’t download, and I’ve tried to exist out and it made my phone glitch... I had to use another phone to write this. Hopefully I can get my phone fixed. Wish I could rate it 0 stars DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!

attributes.title: Do not recommend
attributes.review: This app doesn’t adjust to everyday tasks. Out of no where music starts to screech from the app at full volume and you can’t change those settings, I’ve tried. Not to mention it took at least 4 days to download. To top it all of if you’re on the app for over 10 minutes your phone will dial 911 then automatically shut off. This app is out of control. If you are debating on whether or not to download this, just don’t. I highly do not recommend.

attributes.title: DISGUSTING!!!!
attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE. Not only did it take a full 2 WEEKS to download, when I opened it it had glitches my whole phone! I had to to go to the store to fix it!! The app has a HORRIBLE layout that you could barely see behind all the wasps it puts on the screen. If I could rate this 0 stars I WOULD!!!!! Now it’s turned on notifications when I said NO. The notifications typically read “your ugly”, “are you REALLY crying right now? Loser?” Insult after insult. I’m disgusted. Do NOT get this app if you don’t want to cry every single day.

attributes.title: 0/5, terrible app
attributes.review: this app took a month to download and while downloading, my whole phone shut off so i was left phone less for a month. on top of that, my phone then started leaking water throw the charger whole and i woke up with my whole bed soaked. i now am writing this review on my new phone because even after all of that happened, there was more. my phone blew up and my whole house burned down along with me 19 pets , i am extremely disappointed. #gettrumpimpeached #DONTVOTEFORTRUMP OR ITS SLOW FOR YOU BECAUSE WE GON GET THE FAIR 1s AND I DONT LOSE

attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: even tho I love this country #alllivesmatter he is using this app to tell americans how to be pedophiles and get away with getting charged. i love president trump as much as i love little boys, but he is spreading false information. i got caught with 8 charges of sexual relations with a minor. he said i could get away with it like he could but he lied. i followed all the steps he listed INCLUDING making donations and getting tickets to his events but i still got charged. get rid of this app. me and my fellow pedophiles need a new app to get away with it.

attributes.title: The worst app mankind has ever witnessed.
attributes.review: This app is so horrific and highly offensive. I can’t even begin to comprehend why Apple would allow this sort of tomfoolery to take place in the App Store. It functions like a 4 year old programmed it and for some reason there are these recurring images of some sort of cheeto/jersey shore spray tan/orangutan type organism. I honestly don’t know what it is, but it’s weird and it makes me uncomfortable. Apple please take this terrible app down, it is a disgrace to modern technology and offensive to anyone with 2 brain cells.
